featured.text: With hot stoves, boiling water and sharp knives at hand, it is understandable that parents don’t want children in the kitchen when they’re making dinner.

definition.zh_def: 煮沸；使液體達到沸點，產生氣泡並轉變為氣體。
definition.en_def: To heat a liquid until it reaches its boiling point and turns into vapor.
definition.example: I need to boil some water for the pasta.
